title: HCL Tech, HDFC Bank among 10 companies which witnessed highest selling by mutual funds in December
description: Mutual funds reduced holdings in 10 major companies in December, with the highest selling in HDFC Bank (Rs 6,154 crore), followed by Voltas, HCL Tech, Hindustan Aeronautics, and Mphasis, indicating a shift in investment strategies.
excerpt: 10 companies witnessed the highest selling by Mutual funds in December, according to a press release by Prime database. Here is the detailed list: Sellers

html:
Feb 08, 2025, 11:47:01 AM IST

10 companies witnessed the highest selling by Mutual funds in December, according to a press release by Prime database. Here is the detailed list:

ETMarkets.com

Mutual funds sold 3,51 crore shares of HDFC Bank taking total shares to 158.42 crore in December. The number of shares in September were 161.94 crore. This net selling was of Rs 6,154 crore.

ETMarkets.com

Mutual funds sold 97.95 lakh shares of Voltas taking the total number of shares to 7.08 crore in December. The number of shares in September were 8.06 crore shares. This net selling was of Rs 1,691 crore.

Agencies

Mutual funds sold 81.20 lakh shares of HCL Technologies. The number of shares in December were recorded at 22.23 crore shares against 23.04 crore shares in September. This net selling was of Rs 1,516 crore.

ETMarkets.com

5/11

Hindustan Aeronautics

Mutual funds sold 31.27 lakh shares of Hindustan Aeronautics. The total number of shares recorded in December were 3.10 crore against 3.41 crore in September. This net selling was of Rs 1,355 crore.

Agencies

Around 43.65 lakh shares of Mphasis were sold by mutual funds. The total number of shares recorded in December were 4.16 crore against 4.60 crore in September. This net selling was of Rs 1,296 crore.

Around 62.81 lakh shares of Oberoi Realty were sold by mutual funds taking the total number of shares to 3.15 crore in December. The number of shares in September were 3.78 crore. This net selling was of Rs 1,271 crore.

ETMarkets.com

Around 35.40 lakh shares of Cummins India were sold in December by mutual funds taking the total number of shares to 4.49 crore. The number of shares in September were 4.85 crore. This net selling was of Rs 1,238 crore.

ETMarkets.com

9/11

Bajaj Housing Finance

Around 7.37 crore shares of Bajaj Housing Finance were sold by mutual funds. The total number of shares in December were 3.92 crore against 11.29 crore in September. This net selling was of Rs 1,023 crore.

ETMarkets.com

10/11

Samvardhana Motherson International

Around 5.49 crore shares were sold of Samvardhana Motherson International taking the total shares to 104.30 crore in December. The number of shares in September were 109.80 crore. This net selling was of Rs 964 crore.

ETMarkets.com

11/11

Cholamandalam Investment & Finance Company

Around 72.92 lakh shares were sold of Cholamandalam Investment & Finance Company taking the total shares to 11.24 crore in December. The number of shares in September were 11.97 crore. This net selling was of Rs 944 crore.

ETMarkets.com
